summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2004 ITASCA SUNOVA MOTOR HOME.  THE CONTACT RECEIVED A RECALL NOTICE REGARDING THE BRAKE CALIPERS.  THE NOTICE INDICATED THAT THE PARTS WOULD BE UNAVAILABLE UNTIL FALL OF 2009.  THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED TO BRING THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALER FOR A TEMPORARY REMEDY.  THE CONTACT WILL HAVE HER VEHICLE TOWED TO THE DEALER, BUT FEELS THAT SHE SHOULD NOT HAVE TO PAY THE TOWING COST.  THE NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER WAS UNKNOWN.  THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 22,635.
